sentences.sContent: Parliament will debate the nationalization issue next week.
sentences.sContent_eng: Parliament will debate the nationalization issue next week.
sentences.sCn: 议会将在下周辩论国有化议题。

sentences.sContent: A commitment to nationalization was the banner of British socialism.
sentences.sContent_eng: A commitment to nationalization was the banner of British socialism.
sentences.sCn: 致力于国有化是英国社会主义的旗号。
